title: Looking for Substitute - Bronze/Silver
body:
Hi all!

ADC for Eclipse here, right now we need somebody who can play all the roles and be at least average at them, you'll fill in for any member who cant make it so the team can still play and practice. 

Thanks!
~Twitch

replies.body: Hello there I'm B3 jungle main and I can play Elise , Kindred and Graves very well. I can play all other roles as well but support would be my weakest but I can still play it at average level.

Hello there I'm a top and jg main and extremely good at {{champion:122}} but I'm also capable of playing mid and adc very well, support would be my weakest but I believe I can still play it at an average level since I find it very easy. Add me if your interested

I'm B3 Support and mid main. I play jg sometimes and i can play adc. I just hate top. 
-Catspeare {{champion:268}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:79}}
